entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:22 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain beginning overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late in the evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
